> 1. YouTuber: 34%

> 4. Movie star: 15%
> 5. Filmmaker: 14%

> Over 50% of kids want to be an online creator (#1 + #2)
>
> YouTuber is 2x more popular than pop star or movie star & 3x more popular than pro athlete or astronaut
